body_html:
I tested the benchmark program on four different machines (one uses 0.12 and the rest all use 1.2r) and the problem all occurs. I upgraded TensorFlow from 1.2 to 1.3 via pip on my main server and the problem remains the same.

Then I compiled the latest source cloned this morning. it seems that this problem has been fixed. : )

body:
I tested the benchmark program on four different machines (one uses 0.12 and the rest all use 1.2r) and the problem all occurs. I upgraded TensorFlow from 1.2 to 1.3 via pip on my main server and the problem remains the same.

Then I compiled the latest source cloned this morning. it seems that this problem has been fixed. : )
